name: ashtech/nri-benefits
title: NRI Benefits
description: NRI investment benefits with 7 benefit cards

description.default: For NRIs seeking a rewarding and reliable investment, Ashtech Presidential Towers offers unmatched value:

benefit1.default: High ROI potential and rental yield driven by rapid urban expansion.

benefit2.default: Regular property updates and performance reports for investors abroad.

benefit3.default: Strong resale opportunities supported by infrastructure growth.

benefit4.default: Attractive tax benefits are available for NRI investors.

benefit5.default: Hassle-free repatriation support under FEMA guidelines.

benefit6.default: Home loan partnerships with HDFC, ICICI, Axis, and SBI NRI Services.

benefit7.default:
Prime Greater Noida West location, strategically
connected to Delhi, Noida,
and Gurgaon.

footerText.default: Your investment here is more than a home; it's a long-term growth asset in one of India's most dynamic real estate zones.
